participant_1.name: Olivia
participant_1.background: I am proud of creating beautiful flower arrangements that make people smile. I broke my nose in 5th grade. I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could. I am a Canadian who loves basketball, vintage clothing and my home. I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.background: I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous. I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work. I need to take my blood sugar every day. I am a tour guide that speaks Spanish and English. I cooked a variety of Thai dishes for my family and friends while on vacation.

content.text: I'm a Canadian that loves basketball, vintage clothing and my home. What do you like to do for fun?
I'm a tour guide who speaks Spanish and English. I also like to cook and bake. I'm a big fan of Thai food.
That's great! I love to cook as well, but I'm not as good of a cook as you. I've always wanted to learn how to speak Spanish.
It's not too hard. I took classes in high school and college. I also used Duolingo and other apps to practice.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about being a tour guide?
I love getting to meet new people from all over the world. I also love learning about different cultures and seeing new places.
That sounds like a really fun job. I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks! I do. What do you do for work?
I'm a florist. I love creating beautiful flower arrangements that make people smile.
That's a great job! I love flowers. I always feel so happy when I get flowers.
Thanks! I'm glad you like flowers. I take a lot of pride in my work.
That's obvious. Your arrangements look amazing.
